title: Turkey stuffing
ingredients: ['225g mushrooms (any kind), halved and thinly sliced', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '2 large firm onions, finely diced', '2 sticks celery, diced', '180g breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon coarse salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper', 'Freshly chopped marjoram, thyme and parsley', '3 eggs, beaten']
